item.title: Spanish to English Dictionary in TCL
item.description: Recently I’ve been playing around with possible machine-readable formats for a Spanish to English dictionary. My first attempt was using YAML, something along the lines of hablar: class: verb translation: to talk The schema was pretty simple and soon enough I needed something a bit more complex. Something with support for multiple definitions, context, etc. I could have probably worked on the YAML schema a bit more, and gotten it to be a good fit.
